specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Bonded Bonded fabric is created by fusing two different layers into one, which improves durability. When a winter outer layer is combined with a warm lining, it enhances insulation while also supporting a structured, defined silhouette. Chemical > PU Coated (front) PU coated refers to a thin layer of polyurethane applied to the fabricâ€™s front side. This coating provides water resistance, enhances durability, creates a smooth surface texture, and offers some resistance to stains and wind.
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > PU Coated (front) There may be differences across batches of PU-coated fabrics due to variances in the color, thickness, and application of the coating. When storing the fabric, roll it up instead of folding it to prevent damage to the coated area.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Recommended Use Activewear
